name: margarita Chef cookbook
readme:
or_margarita Cookbook
==================
Installs and configures Margarita in your environment

Requirements
------------
So far this has only been tested on Ubuntu 12.04.
In order to install this, you must also have Reposado configured.


Attributes
----------
default[:or_margarita][:workdir] = '/srv/margarita'

default[:or_margarita][:repo] = 'git://github.com/jessepeterson/margarita.git'

default[:or_margarita][:appname] = 'margarita'

default[:or_margarita][:vhost] = 'margarita.example.com'

Contributing
------------
If you would like to contribute, please follow these steps-

1. Fork the repository on Github
2. Create a named feature branch (like `add_component_x`)
3. Write you change
4. Write tests for your change (if applicable)
5. Run the tests, ensuring they all pass
6. Submit a Pull Request using Github


Authors: Taylor Price
